title: Can we have to take our life decisions by our own? - Quora

response.answer_text: We can but not always. Like it’s not necessary that whatever we decide for ourselves would always end up to be right. Sometimes you do need someone to guide you. By someone i mean older and experienced than you and definitely not your friend who is of your age or your peer. If you don’t have the one, then go find someone whom you trust, but do take guidance and then only take any decisions. God bless!

Taking a life decision for you is best done by yourself only. But we need to keep in mind that other people especially our parents and grand parents have seen more life than we can imagine at the time. So taking their advice into account and also keeping your goals and aspirations in mind, one should take a very informed decision. Usually it will be the best one
Yes, we can take but only after taking suggestions from experienced person about that topic
No we should take take advise of our elders to take decisions.
